Crime: 25yr old male arrested------It is with much pride that I can report that a 25yr old male has been arrested in connection with the double homicide of a 7yr old and 14yr old female on the 17th of October. A mammoth effort by JTF members.------
More to follow------CPU------We are also informed by the Child Protection Unit that there will be a reenactment of the case
